title: One Bowl Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ['250g (9 oz) plain flour', '400g (14 oz) caster sugar', '75g (3 oz) cocoa powder', '1 dessertspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '225ml (8 fl oz) cold filter coffee', '225ml (8 fl oz) milk', '100ml (4 fl oz) vegetable oil', '1 dessertspoon vinegar']
